title: Web Developer
description: Created websites for new clients by converting PSD designs or designing themes in WordPress and Elementor. Customized WooCommerce stores and managed CMS platforms like Wix and Squarespace. Handled website maintenance, updates, web hosting management, and graphic design. Improved website performance with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. Implemented SEO strategies and designed email marketing templates.

title: Senior Graphic Designer
description: Developed branding guidelines and designed digital content, including EDMs, web banners, and social media graphics. Produced print-ready artwork and performed photo retouching and color correction.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed, implemented, and managed WordPress websites, including custom themes and plugins. Handled front-end and back-end development, managed eCommerce and BYOD page updates, and maintained the Linode web server. Provided troubleshooting support and created EDMs, social media creatives, and other graphic designs.

title: Web Developer | Graphics & UI/UX Designer
description: Designed and developed websites using WordPress, Shopify, and Webflow. Managed server operations, security, and implemented SEO strategies. Created visual assets and multimedia content.

title: Graphic Designer | Desktop Publisher | Bid Coordinator
description: Redesigned and maintained the corporate WordPress site. Developed proposals, templates, and marketing materials to boost brand visibility.

title: Web Developer & Designer | Digital Marketing
description: Designed and developed websites with API integrations, managed cPanels, and launched new sites. Created marketing materials and video ads. Managed social media accounts, executed SEO strategies, and handled Google AdWords campaigns.

title: Front-End Developer
description: Designed and developed WordPress sites, custom web prototypes, and worked on the front-end of internal CRM systems. Created logos, images, animations, and banners, while optimizing website speed and SEO.

title: Web Developer | Webmaster
description: Designed and developed websites using WordPress, PHP with Bootstrap, and other CMS platforms. Managed server infrastructure, performed website updates, backups, and troubleshooting. Built and led the production team.
